# omergulcicek.com

> Personal website and blog of Ömer Gülçiçek, Senior Frontend Engineer. React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web development. Technical articles (Turkish), project showcases, experience timeline, and bookmarks. Built with Next.js 16, MDX, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. This file (llms-full.txt) includes the complete list of all blog posts for full-context LLM use.

Site sections: Home (/), Blog (/blog), Experiences (/experiences), Projects (/projects), Bookmarks (/bookmarks), About (/about). Blog posts are in Turkish unless stated otherwise.

## About & Main Pages

- [About](https://omergulcicek.com/about): Bio, skills, services, and contact
- [Experiences](https://omergulcicek.com/experiences): Work and education timeline
- [Projects](https://omergulcicek.com/projects): Open source and side projects
- [Bookmarks](https://omergulcicek.com/bookmarks): Curated links and resources
